Title: Provides that for members of a public pension or retirement system, accrued benefits shall not be diminished or impaired except as authorized and prescribed by the legislature
Summary: Provides that for members of a public pension or retirement system, accrued benefits shall not be diminished or impaired except as authorized and prescribed by the legislature.
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing an amendment to section 7 of article 5 of the constitution, in relation to the calculation of pension benefits for public employees
